translations: n.错误，纰漏；花型面包；（旧时的）女式灯笼裤（bloomers）；开花植物；初轧机；完全成熟的人；（Bloomer）（英）布卢默（人名）

phrs.translation: 开花晚的植物；智力发展晚的人

sentences.sentence: Murakami was a late bloomer, writing his first work at age 29.
sentences.translation: 村上春树大器晚成，29岁才写他的第一部作品。

sentences.sentence: He said: "My father always said to me I would be a late bloomer."
sentences.translation: 他说：“我爸爸总是对我说我是个大器晚成的人。”

sentences.sentence: An Estonian breakfast – curd cheese on a wheat bloomer – known locally as ‘cheese on toast’.
sentences.translation: 爱沙尼亚早餐---小麦面包上涂凝乳，就是当地的“奶酪吐司”。
